summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block Twenty-two (22) of Pontius' Addition to the City of Seattle, running between Thomas and Harrison Street; all in the City of Seattle, by establishing the grade thereof, grading, and by paving the same with asphalt, in accordance with the prayer of the Majority Petition; file number 31651 of the records of the Comptroller of the City of Seattle and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
